headline: Lockheed Martin Advances Construction on new Next Generation Interceptor Facility in Courtland, Alabama
summary: Lockheed Martin (NYSE:LMT) has announced construction on a state-of-the-art facility that will support production of the Next Generation Interceptor (NGI) is nearing completion.

raw.headline: Lockheed Martin Advances Construction on new Next Generation Interceptor Facility in Courtland, Alabama

headline: Northrop Grumman Secures a Contract to Aid SiAW and AARGM-ER Programs
summary: NOC wins a $100M contract to bolster SiAW and AARGM-ER programs, expanding its role in advanced missile systems through 2034.

raw.headline: Northrop Grumman Secures a Contract to Aid SiAW and AARGM-ER Programs
raw.summary: NOC wins a $100M contract to bolster SiAW and AARGM-ER programs, expanding its role in advanced missile systems through 2034.

headline: Lockheed Martin (LMT): Assessing Valuation After a Recent Share Price Sentiment Reset
summary: Lockheed Martin (LMT) has quietly pushed higher in recent sessions, outpacing the broader defense sector even as year to date returns remain negative. This invites a closer look at what the market is pricing in. See our latest analysis for Lockheed Martin. That recent 7 day share price return of 4.50% looks more like a sentiment reset than a full trend change, given the share price is still down 3.19% year to date and the 1 year total shareholder return sits in mildly negative territory. If...
